titles: Christianity abused by the Church of Rome, and popery shewed to be a corruption of it being an answer to a late printed paper given about by papists : in a letter to a gentleman / by J.W.
author: Williams, John, 1636?-1709.
notes: Attributed to John Williams. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Letter addressed: To my honoured friend Mr. S.B.
Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
